description: blue huipil with multicolored embroidery; bordering sleeves and neck opening are floral embroidery; embroidered decorations include animal motifs and geometric shapes; neck opening is square; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides; huipil constructed of two panels
title: Everyday huipil
